name: Lonely Knight - Idle Roguelike RPG
description:
Lonely Knight is a game that combines idle and roguelike elements.

Defeat monsters and embark on a journey to find companions for the lonely knight.

Experience growth through idle gameplay and test your strength in dungeons!

*Recommended for:

-Those who want to experience endless growth and fun.
-Fans of roguelike games.
-Those who enjoy light deck-building games.
-Players with limited time to spend on games.
-Those who want to enjoy games despite having limited time.

*Languages:

-English
-Korean
-Japanese
